lines.text:
[about the future monkeybird queen, who's newly hatched]
Awww! Isn't she cute, Ioz?

[Leans in to take a closer look at the baby, just to get his hair pulled]
Oh! Charming! Just like Niddler!

[With the most exited voice]
Really? Do you really think I resemble royalty?
No, monkeybird. But you're a royal pain!
What about my gold? You promised!
A pirate's promise. I lied.
I can't ask you to continue with me on this dangerous quest. Name the port of your choice and I'll take you there.
Which way does the compass point?

[Ren picks up the compass and spins it around]
The second treasure of Rule... East!
The east it is! For adventure!
For treasure!
For Octopon!
For crying out loud! When are we gonna eat?

[to Tula]
You picked the wrong fight, girl!
[Points to the men standing behind him]
I have my top swordsmen with me!

[Takes it as a huge compliment]
Thank you, master!
And Konk too!
[Konk sighs in disappointment]
This should be easier than taking candy clams from a baby.

[They suddenly hear a very loud growling that sounds like it is coming from a very big monster]
What kind of babies do *you* know?

[In a small boat guiding the heroes through the swamp]
Stroke! Stroke! Let's get this tub moving! I've seen barnacles move faster than this!
Anybody got a lid for that bowl?
What did he say?
I think he'd like you to stick a clam shell in it!
This is going to be a long trip...
